Name: Jackpot Bennaction - B03 : Discover The Mystery Combination
About the game: Discover the value of cards (with or without repetitions), turned face down on the table after the draw, within 6 attempts maximum per match, with the help of the value of cards to previous attempts and these clues... ∧ The sign higher than indicates that he value of the card must be increased compared to previous attempt ∨ The sign lower than indicates that the value of the card must be decreased compared to previous attempt and win at the end of the match... ⇒ a prize for the attempt with the BEST DISCOVERY, in addition to, ⇒ a prize for the COMPLETE DISCOVERY, in addition to, ⇒ a progressive Jackpot for the COMPLETE DISCOVERY to SUCCESSIVE matches. Casino games do not offer 100% chance of winning, however it is possible to frequently get a prize, with Bennaction it is also possible to get the jackpot following a winning streak.
